metadata.description: Location for workspace and solution resources

[REQUIRED for Content Hub] immutableId of the TacitRed data collection rule. Content Hub packaging pipeline must deploy DCR first, read its immutableId, and pass it here. For local testing, deploy DCR first then get ID via: az monitor data-collection rule show --name dcr-tacitred-findings --query immutableId -o tsv
Deploy 3 pre-configured analytics rules for threat detection
Deploy 8 visualization workbooks for threat intelligence analysis
Automatically configure CCF connector definition and data connectors via deployment script
Enable Azure Key Vault for secure credential storage (recommended for production)
Create new Key Vault or use existing one
Name of the Key Vault (new or existing)
Resource group of existing Key Vault (only used if keyVaultOption is 'existing')
Enable private endpoint for Key Vault (requires VNet integration)

Subnet ID for private endpoint (required if enablePrivateEndpoint is true). Format: /subscriptions/{subscription-id}/resourceGroups/{rg-name}/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/{vnet-name}/subnets/{subnet-name}
Change value to force re-execution of the deployment script.

    LastSeen = iif(isnull(lastSeen_t), TimeGenerated, lastSeen_t)
| extend 
    IsActive = datetime_diff('hour', now(), LastSeen) <= 48
| summarize 
    TotalThreats = count(),
    ActiveThreats = countif(IsActive),
    AvgRisk = avg(Risk)
| extend Source = "Cyren";
let TacitRedData = TacitRed_Findings_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(7d)
| extend 
    Confidence = todouble(iif(isnull(confidence_d), 50, confidence_d)),
    LastSeen = iif(isnull(lastSeen_t), TimeGenerated, lastSeen_t)
| extend 
    IsActive = datetime_diff('hour', now(), LastSeen) <= 48
| summarize 
    TotalThreats = count(),
    ActiveThreats = countif(IsActive),
    AvgRisk = avg(Confidence)
| extend Source = "TacitRed";
union CyrenData, TacitRedData
| summarize 
    TotalThreats = sum(TotalThreats),
    TotalActive = sum(ActiveThreats),
    WeightedAvgRisk = avg(AvgRisk)
| extend 
    OverallRiskLevel = case(
        TotalActive >= 50, "ðŸ”´ Critical",

        TotalActive >= 10, "ðŸŸ¡ Elevated",
        "ðŸŸ¢ Normal"

| project

    TotalThreats,
    ActiveThreats = TotalActive,
    WeightedAvgRisk = round(WeightedAvgRisk, 2)","size":0,"title":"ðŸ“Š Overall Risk Assessment","timeContext":{"durationMs":0},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"table"},"name":"query-overall-risk"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"// 30-DAY THREAT TREND
union isfuzzy=true withsource=TableName Cyren_Indicators_CL, TacitRed_Findings_CL
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(30d)
| extend Source = case(
    TableName == "Cyren_Indicators_CL", "Cyren",
    "TacitRed"
)
| summarize Count = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), Source
| order by TimeGenerated asc","size":0,"title":"ðŸ“ˆ 30-Day Threat Trend","timeContext":{"durationMs":2592000000},"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"areachart"},"name":"query-trend"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"// SLA PERFORMANCE METRICS

Cyren_Indicators_CL

| summarize 
    AvgResponseTime = avg(ResponseTimeHours),

    SLACompliance = round(100.0 * countif(ResponseTimeHours <= SLATarget) / count(), 2)
| extend 
    SLAStatus = case(
        SLACompliance >= 95, "âœ… Excellent",
        SLACompliance >= 85, "âœ”ï¸ Good",
        SLACompliance >= 75, "âš ï¸ Needs Improvement",
        "âŒ Critical"
    )
| project 
    SLAStatus,
    SLACompliance,
    AvgResponseTime = round(AvgResponseTime, 2),
    MaxResponseTime = round(MaxResponseTime, 2)","size":0,"title":"ðŸŽ¯ SLA Performance Metrics","timeContext":{"durationMs":604800000},"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"table"},"name":"query-sla"}],"styleSettings":{},"$schema":"https://github.com/Microsoft/Application-Insights-Workbooks/blob/master/schema/workbook.json"}

{"version":"Notebook/1.0","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"# ðŸ” Threat Hunter's Arsenal

## Advanced Investigation & Proactive Hunting

**Capabilities:**
- Rapid Credential Reuse Detection
- Persistent Infrastructure Identification
- Attack Chain Reconstruction
- MITRE ATT&CK Mapping
- IOC Multi-Context Enrichment

**Purpose:** Accelerate threat hunting with automated behavioral pattern detection"},"name":"header-text"},{"type":9,"content":{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","parameters":[{"id":"time-param","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"TimeRange","type":4,"isRequired":true,"value":{"durationMs":604800000},"typeSettings":{"selectableValues":[{"durationMs":86400000},{"durationMs":604800000},{"durationMs":2592000000}],"allowCustom":true},"label":"Time Range"}],"style":"pills","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"name":"parameters-1"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"// RAPID CREDENTIAL REUSE DETECTION
TacitRed_Findings_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(7d)
| extend 
    Email = tostring(email_s),
    Domain = tostring(domain_s),
    FirstSeen = todatetime(coalesce(firstSeen_t, TimeGenerated)),
    LastSeen = todatetime(coalesce(lastSeen_t, TimeGenerated)),
    FindingType = tostring(findingType_s),
    Confidence = todouble(confidence_d)
| summarize 
    FindingCount = count(),
    Domains = make_set(Domain),
    MinFirstSeen = min(FirstSeen),
    MaxLastSeen = max(LastSeen),
    AvgConfidence = avg(Confidence)
    by Email
| extend TimeSpanHours = datetime_diff('hour', MaxLastSeen, MinFirstSeen)
| extend UniqueDomains = array_length(Domains)
| extend ReuseVelocity = iff(TimeSpanHours > 0, todouble(FindingCount) / todouble(TimeSpanHours), 0.0)
| extend BehaviorScore = case(
        FindingCount >= 5 and TimeSpanHours <= 24, 95,
        FindingCount >= 3 and TimeSpanHours <= 72, 85,
        FindingCount >= 2 and UniqueDomains >= 2, 75,
        50
    )
| extend HuntingFlag = case(
    BehaviorScore >= 75, "ðŸŽ¯ High Risk",
    "ðŸ“Š Normal Activity"
)
| project 
    HuntingFlag, 
    Email, 
    FindingCount, 
    UniqueDomains, 
    TimeSpanHours, 
    ReuseVelocity = round(ReuseVelocity, 3), 
    BehaviorScore,
    AvgConfidence = round(AvgConfidence, 2),
    AffectedDomains = strcat_array(Domains, ", ")
| order by BehaviorScore desc
| take 100","size":0,"title":"ðŸŽ¯ Rapid Credential Reuse Detection","timeContext":{"durationMs":0},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"table"},"name":"query-credential-reuse"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"// PERSISTENT MALWARE INFRASTRUCTURE
Cyren_Indicators_CL
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(30d)
| extend 
    Domain = tostring(coalesce(domain_s, extract(@"://([^/]+)", 1, tostring(url_s)), "unknown")),
    FirstSeen = todatetime(coalesce(firstSeen_t, TimeGenerated)),
    LastSeen = todatetime(coalesce(lastSeen_t, TimeGenerated)),
    Category = tostring(category_s),
    Risk = toint(coalesce(risk_d, 50))
| summarize 
    DetectionCount = count(),
    DetectionDays = dcount(bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)),
    Categories = make_set(Category),
    FirstDetection = min(FirstSeen),
    LastDetection = max(LastSeen),
    MaxRisk = max(Risk)
    by Domain
| extend LifespanDays = datetime_diff('day', LastDetection, FirstDetection)
| extend IsCurrentlyActive = datetime_diff('hour', now(), LastDetection) <= 48
| extend PersistenceScore = case(
        DetectionDays >= 20 and IsCurrentlyActive, 100,
        DetectionDays >= 14 and IsCurrentlyActive, 90,
        DetectionDays >= 10 and IsCurrentlyActive, 80,
        DetectionDays >= 7, 70,
        60
    )
| extend HuntingFlag = case(
    PersistenceScore >= 80 and IsCurrentlyActive, "ðŸŽ¯ High Persistence",
    "ðŸ“Š Normal Activity"
)
| project 
    HuntingFlag, 
    Domain, 
    DetectionCount, 
    DetectionDays, 
    LifespanDays,
    PersistenceScore, 
    IsCurrentlyActive, 
    MaxRisk,
    MalwareCategories = strcat_array(Categories, ", ")
| order by PersistenceScore desc
| take 100","size":0,"title":"ðŸ—ï¸ Persistent Malware Infrastructure","timeContext":{"durationMs":2592000000},"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"table"},"name":"query-persistent-infrastructure"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"// MITRE ATT&CK MAPPING
let CredentialAccessTechniques = TacitRed_Findings_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(7d)
| extend 
    FindingType = tostring(findingType_s),
    Confidence = todouble(confidence_d),
    Email = tostring(email_s),
    Domain = tostring(domain_s)
| extend 
    MitreTechnique = case(
        FindingType contains "credential" or FindingType contains "password", "T1078 - Valid Accounts",
        FindingType contains "dump", "T1003 - OS Credential Dumping",
        "T1552 - Unsecured Credentials"
    ),
    MitreTactic = "TA0006 - Credential Access",
    ThreatSource = "TacitRed"
| summarize 
    Detections = count(),
    UniqueAccounts = dcount(Email),
    UniqueDomains = dcount(Domain),
    AvgConfidence = round(avg(Confidence), 2),
    AffectedAccounts = make_set(Email, 10)
    by MitreTactic, MitreTechnique, ThreatSource;
let InitialAccessTechniques = Cyren_Indicators_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(7d)
| extend 
    Category = tostring(category_s),
    Type = tostring(type_s),
    Risk = toint(coalesce(risk_d, 50)),
    Domain = tostring(coalesce(domain_s, extract(@"://([^/]+)", 1, tostring(url_s))))
| extend 
    MitreTechnique = case(
        Category contains "phish" or Type contains "phish", "T1566 - Phishing",
        Category contains "exploit" or Category contains "vulnerability", "T1190 - Exploit Public-Facing Application",
        Category contains "drive-by" or Category contains "watering", "T1189 - Drive-by Compromise",
        Category contains "supply", "T1195 - Supply Chain Compromise",
        "T1566.002 - Phishing: Spearphishing Link"
    ),
    MitreTactic = "TA0001 - Initial Access",
    ThreatSource = "Cyren"
| summarize 
    Detections = count(),

properties.description: Detects users who have been compromised multiple times within a 7-day window. This may indicate a persistent threat or inadequate remediation.
properties.query:
let lookbackPeriod = 7d;
let threshold = 2;
TacitRed_Findings_CL
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(lookbackPeriod)
| extend Email = tostring(email_s), Username = tostring(username_s), Domain = tostring(domain_s), FindingType = tostring(findingType_s), Confidence = todouble(confidence_d), FirstSeen = todatetime(firstSeen_t), LastSeen = todatetime(lastSeen_t), Notes = tostring(notes_s)
| summarize CompromiseCount = count(), FindingTypes = make_set(FindingType), FirstCompromise = min(FirstSeen), LatestCompromise = max(LastSeen), AverageConfidence = avg(Confidence), Domains = make_set(Domain), AllNotes = make_list(Notes) by Email, Username
| where CompromiseCount >= threshold
| extend CompromiseWindow = datetime_diff('day', LatestCompromise, FirstCompromise), Severity = case(CompromiseCount >= 5, 'Critical', CompromiseCount >= 3, 'High', 'Medium')
| project Email, Username, CompromiseCount, Severity, FirstCompromise, LatestCompromise, CompromiseWindow, AverageConfidence, FindingTypes, Domains, AllNotes
| order by CompromiseCount desc, LatestCompromise desc
